content:
Let's break down the spending by store. Here's the updated list:

**Tiffany's:**
**Total:** $250
**Item:** Silver necklace with small diamond pendant

**Best Buy:**
**Total:** $849
**Item:** Samsung Galaxy smartphone
**Item:** Accessories (screen protector and case)

**Williams-Sonoma:**
**Total:** $120
**Item:** 10-piece cooking utensil set

Now you can see how much you've spent at each store. If you want to add more purchases or gifts, I can update this list accordingly.

Also, if you'd like to see a total of all your gift spending across all stores, I can give you that as well. Just let me know!
